Class Game

java.lang.Object
parade.Game
public class Game extends Object
Main class for the Parade game. Handles game initialization, intro menu, and managing the main game loop and exit process.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    Game()
    Constructs a new Game instance, initializing the game state manager and input manager.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    exit()
    Terminates the game cleanly, displaying an exit message, uninstalling the Jansi console handler, and exiting the JVM.
    void
    gameRules()
    Displays the game rules and waits for the player to press Enter to return to the previous screen.
    void
    intro()
    Displays the introduction screen and handles the user's menu selection: start the game, view the game rules, or exit.
    static void
    main(String[] args)
    Main entry point for launching the Parade game.
    void
    run()
    Starts the game, shows the intro screen, and begins the main game loop.

    Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

    clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

  • Constructor Details

    • Game

      public Game()
      Constructs a new Game instance, initializing the game state manager and input manager.

  • Method Details

    • intro

      public void intro()
      Displays the introduction screen and handles the user's menu selection: start the game, view the game rules, or exit.
      Throws:
      IOException - if there is an error during input selection

    • gameRules

      public void gameRules()
      Displays the game rules and waits for the player to press Enter to return to the previous screen.

    • run

      public void run()
      Starts the game, shows the intro screen, and begins the main game loop. This method installs the Jansi console handler and ensures the game transitions between states using the GameStateManager.

    • exit

      public void exit()
      Terminates the game cleanly, displaying an exit message, uninstalling the Jansi console handler, and exiting the JVM.

    • main

      public static void main(String[] args)
      Main entry point for launching the Parade game.
      Parameters:
      args - command-line arguments (not used)
